tagDescription: Correspondence with Harold Sifton Concerning the conflict of interest between The Georgian Bay Canal Company and The National Hydro Electric Company Limited.

Correspondence with Harold Sifton Concerning the Cabinet's consideration of the plans of The Georgian Bay Canal Co.An order - in - council approving the Company's plans was required before actual construction could commence.
